column2: UPDATE 2-Icahn says fight for PayPal spinoff just getting started March 6 Activist investor Carl Icahn told eBay Inc shareholders in a letter on Thursday he has "not yet begun to fight" to get the e-commerce company to spin off its PayPal payments unit.

column3: lays off 700 LOS ANGELES/SAN FRANCISCO
column4: March 6 Walt Disney  overhauled its struggling interactive division in a sweeping reorganization that will reduce the number of video games it develops and alter its advertising strategy to focus more on the fast-changing mobile market.  UPDATE 1-Disney overhauls troubled interactive unit

column2: UPDATE 4-Deep discounting eats into Costco's holiday-quarter profit March 6 Warehouse retailer Costco Wholesale Corp  reported a bigger-than-expected 15 percent fall in quarterly profit as unusually deep discounting in the holiday shopping season hurt margins
column3: sending its shares down as much as 3.6 percent.

column2: UPDATE 1-Motor racing-Williams seeks to revive fortunes with Martini LONDON
column3: March 6 Former champion Formula One team Williams believes a new sponsorship deal with Italian drinks brand Martini can help to make it competitive again after a dismal season in 2013.

column2: Flickr co-founder seeks another hit with new Findery app SAN FRANCISCO
column3: March 6 Findery
column4: a map-based social networking service started by the co-founder of popular photo-sharing site Flickr
column5: launched a mobile app on Thursday.
